title: Some stocks are getting close to CEF yields
text:
It'd be interesting to see what people think of the various fallen stocks that have breached or are about to breach the 7% yield.. I could list stuff like BGS or even M .. but we'll stay away from the wild 10%+ ones. :D

My two larger positions are MO and OXY - and nothing about them is normal - mergers and fights and leverage. Runner ups are DOW and F, but they are not quite there yet.. and to be honest I'd prefer F over DOW. I also have a position in BTI.. because I think any bounce in the GBP is good for that.. and just plain curiosity... Have any of you guys started to look at these vanilla stocks as opposed to HY funds?
description: It'd be interesting to see what people think of the various fallen stocks that have breached or are about to breach the 7% yield.. I could list stuff - 20641
